trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: Definiuje kontrakt opcjonalne, które powiązanie można zaimplementować w celu określenia, czy żądania przychodzące są obsługiwane synchronicznie lub asynchronicznie przez usługę.

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: W niektórych przypadkach może być bardziej wydajny powiązania do przetwarzania komunikatów z synchronicznego <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>metody.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>klasy Opcjonalnie można zaimplementować IBindingRuntimePreferences, aby wskazać dotyczące obiektów wywołujących, że jest to preferowany.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli powiązanie nie implementuje IBindingRuntimePreferences, [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] domyślnie korzysta z asynchronicznych wersji środowiska uruchomieniowego modelu usługi warstwy `Receive` i `Request` metody.

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli powiązanie zaimplementować IBindingRuntimePreferences, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] warstwy obsługi modelu usługi sprawdza wartość <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>i użyty do określenia, czy do wywołania synchronicznego wersje tych metod (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) lub wersje asynchroniczne (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli IBindingRuntimePreferences jest implementowany przez powiązanie i zwraca `true` z <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>Właściwości, zalecane jest, że używasz synchroniczne <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>metody odbierać komunikaty z kanału.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wiązanie nie implementuje IBindingRuntimePreferences lub zwraca `false` z <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>Właściwości, zalecane jest, że używasz asynchroniczną <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>lub <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>metody.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: Niezależnie od tego, wartość zwracana przez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>Właściwości, wszystkie powiązania nadal muszą zawierać prawidłowy implementacje zarówno synchroniczne i asynchroniczne wersji `Receive` metody dla typów określonego kanału zaimplementowana.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji o implementacji kanałów niestandardowych, zobacz [kanały rozwijających się](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wartość wskazującą, czy żądania przychodzące mogą być obsługiwane bardziej wydajne synchronicznie lub asynchronicznie.

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Standardowe (dostarczane przez system) powiązań dostarczonych przez [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] zostały zaimplementowane w tym interfejsie i w niektórych przypadkach należy zastąpić wartość domyślną do przetwarzania komunikatów przychodzących synchronicznie.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli żądania są obsługiwane wydajniej synchronicznie; w przeciwnym razie<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Wartość domyślna to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, do obsługi żądań asynchronicznie.
